musicalLanguage.description: A majestic, spacious piece evoking the first light breaking over a mountain range. Open fifths and octaves in both hands create a sense of vastness, while the melody climbs upward like the sun rising above the peaks.
keyMoments: Vast open fifth at the start
teachingGoals: Practice wide intervals and open voicings
Develop a sense of musical space and grandeur
styleTips: Play with a sense of grandeur and space
Let the wide intervals ring out with full pedal
